channel.title: Privacy on Lionel Ragot
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Lionel Ragot

item.title: The Macroeconomics of Free Digital Services
item.description: In this article, we develop a growth model with digital service providers collecting data from households in exchange for using their services to sell targeted advertising to traditional companies. It allows us to study the impacts of this sector on the main macroeconomic aggregates and welfare in the context of the United States
